Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy

EnvironmentalScience.org does not sell data collected or used in collaboration with our sources and partners. We value the privacy of our visitors and the safety of your information.

Your Information

This information covers the usage of our website and its pages. Our primary focus is to give visitors valuable, accurate and reliable tools. The use of our site is free of charge and submitting of any personal information is not needed.

Google Analytics

Google Analytics is a web analysis service provided by Google. Google utilizes the data collected to track and examine the use of www.environmentalscience.org, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other Google services.

Google may use the data collected to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.

Personal data collected: Cookie and Usage Data. Place of processing: USA. Find Google’s privacy policy here.

How to Contacting Us

You can get in touch with us via email at info@environmentalscience.org.

Updates to EnvironmentalScience.org Privacy Policy

Our Privacy Policy may change and all updates will be posted on this page.
